hero.label: ABOUT US
hero.title: Innovation that transforms the future
hero.description: We are leaders in enterprise technology solutions, committed to excellence and continuous innovation to drive our clients' growth.

ourStory.label: OUR STORY
ourStory.title: A journey of innovation and growth
ourStory.p1: Since our inception in 2008, GTEC has been a pioneer in transforming how companies adopt technology. We started as a small team of visionaries passionate about innovation.
ourStory.p2: Today, we are recognized as leaders in the sector, serving companies of all sizes with solutions that drive growth and efficiency. Our commitment to excellence has led us to win multiple international awards.
ourStory.p3: But what truly defines us is not the awards, but our clients' success stories and the positive impact we generate in their organizations every day.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Empower companies with innovative technology solutions that drive their digital transformation, optimize their processes, and generate sustainable value. We are committed to being the strategic partner our clients need to achieve their most ambitious goals.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be recognized as the global leader in technology consulting, setting new standards of excellence, innovation, and customer service. We aspire to create a future where technology is accessible, efficient, and transformative for all organizations.

values.label: WHAT DEFINES US
values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The fundamental principles that guide our work and decisions every day

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive to exceed expectations in every project, delivering solutions of the highest quality.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We adopt the latest technologies and methodologies to stay at the forefront of the industry.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We act with transparency, honesty, and ethics in all our business relationships.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work as a team, both internally and with our clients, to achieve shared goals.

improvement.title: Continuous Improvement
improvement.description: We are committed to learning and constant evolution of our capabilities.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We love what we do and that passion is reflected in the quality of our work and service.

items.title: GTEC Foundation
items.description: We started operations with a team of 5 people passionate about technology and innovation.

items.title: Regional Expansion
items.description: We opened our first international office and reached 50 active clients.

items.title: International Recognition
items.description: We received our first 'Best Technology Partner' award for our excellence in service.

items.title: Digital Transformation
items.description: We launched our consulting division in digital transformation and cloud computing.

items.title: Great Place to Work Certification
items.description: Recognized as one of the best places to work in technology.

items.title: Market Leader
items.description: We reached 200+ clients and a team of over 50 certified professionals.

items.title: AI Innovation
items.description: Launch of our specialized practice in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.
